title: The new cops'n'robbers skins are coming out tomorrow (i think!)

embed.description: A pair of ne'erdowells are putting the squeeze on League of Legends. In the dead of night, they broke into the store and stole Hippalus' most prized possessions (he really loves his socks). The two best detectives in the history of detecting are on the case but, to prevent further chaos, we're giving in to their demands.

body:
"**A pair of ne’erdowells** *(eve and twitch)*  are putting the squeeze on League of Legends. In the dead of night, they broke into the store and stole Hippalus’ most prized possessions (he really loves his socks). T**he two best detectives** *(trundle and voli)* in the history of detecting are on the case but, to prevent further chaos, we’re giving in to their demands. These are dark days in League… kind of."


annnnd its happening tomorrow. ima call it now. {{champion:28}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:106}}

replies.body: Probably. They already released the good skins this week though.

*"Seems like no one has joined the conversation yet, be the first to comment below!"*

FIRST!
